archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0479
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a product manager, I want to be able to have a tag/flag against customer accounts who are or have medically dependent or vulnerable users in their household, so that I can easily report on these customers.

properties.value: 3 flags to be added for customer account def. The flags may impact other places in the system. Handled by the Vodafone staff. The request to register such an order should be made by the Customer himself (by filling special a form).

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
